scripts.package: concurrently "cd server && npm install" "cd client && npm install"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run server" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.pre-build: concurrently "cd server && npm install" "cd client && npm install && npm run build"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install && npm run pre-build
